title: $10 Billion Milestone Achieved in one month after Bitcoin ETFs launch
description: In a remarkable feat, the recently approved spot Bitcoin exchange-traded funds (ETFs) have collectively amassed over $10 billion in assets under management (AUM) within just one month of their launch. The milestone was reached, marking a significant moment in the integration of cryptocurrency into traditional financial markets. Bitcoin ETFs drive remarkable asset growth Nine spot […]

title: Kraken Focuses Shift to Fostering Crypto Education and Awareness: Report

title: Top Analyst Unveils Massive Bitcoin Price Target by End of 2025, Says BTC Chart Looks Beautiful
description:
